com.yantra.ycp.japi.ue

Interface YCPGetShortZipCodeUE


  • public interface YCPGetShortZipCodeUE
    User exit that serves as a mechanism for retrieving short Zip code for the YFS_PERSON_INFO table.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document getShortZipCode(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The YCPGetShortZipCodeUE user exit is called by YSCUpdateBestMatchRegionAgent and during creation of a new person info record.

    • Method Detail

      • getShortZipCode

        org.w3c.dom.Document getShortZipCode(YFSEnvironment env,
                                     org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                              throws com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException

        The YCPGetShortZipCodeUE user exit is called by YSCUpdateBestMatchRegionAgent and during creation of a new person info record. This user exit will only be called when a zip code is defined in the person info record and the person info's country does not already have a pre-defined regular expression in YFS_COMMON_CODE_ATTRIBUTE.

        To code custom user exits, implement the method in this interface. The system calls the methods in your class. If this method gives any exception, the current transaction is rolled back.

        The user exit implementation can get the enterprise code from the environment variable by calling the getUEParam(String variable) method.

        Example : env.getUEParam("EnterpriseCode")


        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD

        Pre-conditions: This user exit is called if zip code is defined but YFC_COMMON_CODE_ATTRIBUTE does not have a defined REGEXP.

        Post-conditions: The return parameter should contain the ShortZipCode value for the region matching mechanism and for YFS_PERSON_INFO table.


        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API. This is required for the user exit to raise errors and access environment information.
        inXML - Required. Any XML document that contains sufficient information to obtain the ShortZipCode. For more information, see the associated input xml files.


        Returns:
        A valid XML containing the ShortZipCode. For details on the output, refer to the associated output files.


        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSUserExitException - This exception is thrown whenever system errors that the application cannot handle are encountered. The transaction is aborted and changes are rolled back.


        public Document getShortZipCode(YFSEnvironment env, Document inXML) throws YFSUserExitException ;
